info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 4:23PM MST until September 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 423 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain were persisting around Colorado City and Hildale. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen with the heaviest amounts on the east side of Colorado City. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible north of Hildale. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Short Creek and Colorado City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
